summary: I just saw the end to Shutter Island, with Leonardo DiCaprio, and I came to the conclusion that THAT would be the only reason I...
body:
I just saw the end to Shutter Island, with Leonardo DiCaprio, and I came to the conclusion that THAT would be the only reason I would cheer for Jon killing Daenerys.

If another season had been made(as there should have been) and we saw a scenario where Jon and Dany have kids and Dany’s actions affected their children negatively, THEN I would accept her death at Jon’s hands.


Not because she killed people out of character. She killed slavers. Am I supposed to feel sorry for those bitches? I don’t.

Shit, should I feel sorry for the Nazis that surrendered and were still massacred by the US army in rage after they saw what they did to the holocaust victims? I don’t.

Slavers, the Dothraki that threatened to rape her and the Harpy can all suck a dick. You know what? King’s Landing can suck a dick too!

summary: The fact that Daenerys is herself a child conceived by rape just adds to her tragedy. Like this girl has so rarely known...
body: The fact that Daenerys is herself a child conceived by rape just adds to her tragedy. Like this girl has so rarely known safety.  Her conception was violent, her birth was violent, almost her entire life has been violent.  It’s like the universe itself made it it’s mission to be cruel to this child.  My heart continues to break for her.

summary:
Quick question, why do Dany antis think it clever to throw her 8x05 actions as some sick burn against her stans?
Like, for 7 and...
body:
Quick question, why do Dany antis think it clever to throw her 8x05 actions as some sick burn against her stans?

Like, for 7 and a half seasons and 5 books I’ve been following a character that has done everything in her power to protect those unable to protect themselves, and has never used violence against an innocent, do you really think you’ll find a single fan of hers that not only isn’t fucking livid with a completely out of character 180° that had her massacring innocent souls but actually condones it?!

body:
Burning ember ch.7

A/N- This one is a long one sorry! Hope you guys like it!

And remember this series is going to be like a rewrite and an AU!

Warning- none

Episode- 2x01, 2x02, 2x03, 2x04

Pairing- Aegon x Targaryen!reader

Tagged- @starkbelova , @kaleidoscope-holds-the-prophecy, @omgsuperstarg , @netuno-graphics , @wot0-0

(Let me know if you want to be tagged)

—

Elirion is Aegons Dragon He’s a red and black dragon. His primary color is red all around his body. He’s as big as Daenerys dragon Drogon. His wings go from red to black on the tips, his horns and spinal crest are black. He named him Elirion after mother who was murdered in the red keep he will do her murder justice. Oraxsus is your dragon she’s black and blue and the smallest dragon out of all five that hatched that day. She has the same color pattern as Daenerys dragon Drogon but instead of red yours has blue. Yours had been born smaller then the rest and weaker something that worried you a lot.

“Come on Oraxsus you have to eat.” You pleaded our dragon who was refusing to eat out of your hand. You looked over at your brother Aegon who was successfully feeding his dragon. You looked back at your dragon in a huff and tried again but it wouldn’t bite. Her breathing seemed to be raspy and weak. Your trailed your finger alongside her scaled body. “I hope you’re fine.” You put her back in her little crate that you all had made for your dragons to be in.

“Yours won’t eat either?” Daenerys asked as she came to walk by you. You nodded and gave another quick glance to oraxsus.

“Yours do eat mine won’t eat all I don’t know why. But I also think she’s not that well.” You tell her and she hums in response.

“Well it’s not like we can do much about it but keep trying I’m sure she’ll get better.” She said with a small smile for comfort. Her smile was short lived though because when she heard her horse die and fall to the ground that smile was replaced with a frown. She quickly ran over to it checking for any hope for it to still be alive. Aegons horse had died the day before due to the hot sun and the little food or water you all have left. Many horses had died for the same reasons but they weren’t going to waste. Their meat is used for food for both all of you and now the Dragons. But eventually the food will run low and their looked to be no place in sight.

We sent three Dothraki men to go search the end of the red waste. In search for anything that isn’t this. In order to the save the people we have we have to make scarficies like send our remaining horses along with them.

-

The sun was hot and what little air was blowing was hot as well. Your throat and lips were dry from the lack of water and the increasing heat. It was taking more time then you had wanted waiting for the three men we sent to return with sort of answer. You sat back to back with Aegon as you all waited.

Their was a distant sound of a horse approaching. It could just be a daydream you thought to yourself. But the footsteps only sounded louder as it closer. You turned your head and knew for sure that it was real.

“Aegon.” You said calling out to him. He hummed in response and you moved your head to point to the approaching horse. He got up immediatly and you followed his actions too. Any sign of hope you had immediatly died down as you saw no rider on that horse. Ser Jorah approached it first with Aegon not far behind. The horse had red markings all around and seemed to have a bag on its side that was dripping. You slowly moved towards them and Daenerys was right beside you. Ser Jorah opened the bag and lifted what was inside just a little. You then saw the hair and then saw the liquid dripping from the bag and then quickly knew what had happened. They had beheaded him. Aegon turned his head and huffed out in frustration.

“You don’t need to see this.” Ser Jorah said mainly directing his comment to Daenerys who all noticed what had happened.

“He is blood of my blood.” She said as she stood by the horse. “Who did this?” She asked in anger.

“Khal Pono perhaps, Khal Jhaqo they don’t like the idea of three foreigners leading a khalasar.” Ser Jorah pointed out.

“They’ll like it far less when we are done with them.” Daenerys said and you nodded your head in agreement. Irri rushed towards the horse and to the bag with Rakharo’s head. Her sobs were loud as she fell to the ground. Daenerys took her in her arms trying to comfort her. She was saying that they had killed his soul because they didn’t burn his body. Daenerys promised her that she will build a funeral pyre. You kneel down beside them feeling her pain. You don’t know what you would do if Aegon got killed. You place a hand on top of her head and brush her hair with your fingers for comfort. You then start talking to her in Dothraki.

“They’ll know about us just you watch they’ll soon regret the day they killed him and regret that they left our khalasar they’ll soon know who the Targaryens truly are.”

-

You wait again and again waiting for any of the other two bloodriders to come back. As you wait you sit and grab your dragon Oraxsus. You gently pet the top of her head. She’s still weak and seems weaker then before. She won’t even open her eyes today. You just see her little body move up and down very slow.

“Please wake up oraxsus come on you’re a strong girl I know so.” You whisper to her. You feel someone walk up behind you and sit by you. You turn your head and it’s Daenerys.

“Is she doing any better?” She asks you and you look back at oraxsus.

“No she seems to be doing worse now.” You can’t help but feel warm tears threaten to fall. You couldn’t help but think if you’re doing something wrong or if you’ve done something wrong. In such a little time you already feel attatched to this little dragon. You take a deep breath to try and calm yourself. You keep petting oraxsus until you don’t hear any noise coming from her. You watch closely and don’t see her chest moving anymore. You bring her little chest up to your ear and don’t hear her heartbeat and don’t feel her breath. The tears then return and this time they roll down your cheek. You look over at Daenerys who is still beside you. A sad look in your eyes something that she hasn’t seen in you. And something you’ve never showed her.

You don’t have to say anything for her to know what was going on. You continue to try and pet oraxsus as if that will do anything to her state. To see if with your touch she would wake up or return to life but she hasn’t. You bring one hand and cover your mouth as your tears roll down faster. Daenerys wraps her arm around your shoulder and pulls you closer to her. With her other hand she lets it brush your hair as she tries to sooth you. Your cries turn into sobs but they aren’t loud ones not wanting to let others see how you were. Not wanting to let them see you like this. You bring oraxsus lifeless body close to your chest. You then feel other arms wrap around you and you knew who’s they were.

At Aegons touch it only seemed to make you feel worse. Your sobs becoming a little louder then they were. He doesn’t say anything he just kisses the side of your head and comforts you. You didn’t feel Daenerys leave your side.

You later buried your dragon. Daenerys and Aegon were by your side when you did. Your dragon dying also made you think about something you had read about dragons long ago when you were younger. Something that scared you just a little as you remembered it. But also something you don’t want to believe in but theirs a little part of you that does. You had read that if dragons were born weak and died a little after birth then that meant that the person was of bad omen. But you also thought that was only in a book and that you shouldnt believe what it had said. You just let yourself wonder not telling anyone of your thoughts. That weren’t true. Or atleast you hoped.

Daenerys being worried for you and your dragon and comforting you made you feel differently about her. She had announced that she would rule by the side of you and your brother something you didn’t expect her to say but she did. She had always been kind to you but of course you were difficult. Maybe it’s alright to trust her and not kill her. Maybe

-

“This isnt your horse.” Daenerys said to the blood rider Kovarro that had returned. You stood up from where you were sitting and walked over to where they were.

“It was given to me by the thirteen the elders of Qarth.” Kovarro said.

“Qarth?” Aegon asked.

“Three days to the east, on the sea.” Kovarro answered.

“Will they let us in?” Daenerys asked him.

“They said they would be honored to recieve the mother of dragons and the Dragon queen and dragon king.” He answered as he got bags that were on his horse.

“What do you know of this place?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah.

“Only that the desert around there walls is called the garden of bones. Everytime the qartheen shut their gates on a traveler the garden grows.”

-

As we got closer to what Kovarro said was Qarth. Ser Jorah was right. The desert around the huge walls were huge. As we got close soilders came out from the gates and thirteen men followed behind them.

“I thought we were welcome?” Daenerys asked.

“If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city you would do the same khaleesi.” Ser Jorah said. You looked behind to the khalasar who was no horde at all.

“Horde?” You asked.

“My name is—”

“Your name is Daenerys of house Targaryen and you are Aegon Of house Targaryen and you Y/N of house Targaryen.” The man inturrpted casuing you to be confused on how he knew your names. Espically yours and Aegons.

“You know us my lord?” Daenerys asked the man who Inturrpted her.

“Only by reputation Khaleesi and I’m no lord merely a humble merchant. They call you the mother of dragons ” He said. You heard that name be called to her again ‘the mother of dragons’.It was a deserving name since she had three dragons and Aegon and you only had one. But it was still confusing on how fast they had thought of that name since you guys have been in a desert ever since they were born.

“And what should we call you?” She asked him.

“Oh my name is quite long and quite impossible for foreigners to pronounce I am simply a trader of spices.” He responded still not really answering her question. “But we are the thirteen charged with the governance and protection of Qarth the greatest city that ever was or will be.” He finished saying. You three looked at one another not knowing who was going to respond or how.

“The beauty of quarth is legendary—-“

“Qarth.” He corrected her.

“Eh Qarth.” She repeated saying it right this time.

“Might we see the dragons?” He asked. You three looked at eachother again and shared a knowing look and unspoken conversation. Aegon stepped up and spoke this time.

“My Friend we have traveled very far we have no food no water once we see our people fed we would be honored.” Aegon told the man.

“Forgive me Dragon King But no man alive has seen a living dragon. Some of my more skeptical friends refuse to believe your children even exist. All we ask is a chance to see for ourselves.” The man told Aegon. Aegon took a step closer trying to convince to man to let us all In.

“Trust me I saw them being born we are NOT liars.” Aegon responded his voice sounded annoyed at the man’s persistence on not letting us In.

“Well I don’t think you are because I’ve never met you before my opinion on the matter is of limited value.” The man answered.

“Where we come from guests are treated with respect not insulted at the gates.” Daenerys said also getting annoyed at the man. You were also getting annoyed all you wanted to do was atleast get some fresh water somewhere to be where it wasn’t covered with sand.

“Perhaps you should return where you came from we wish you well.” He responded getting you mad now. He then turned his back and began to walk away. This got you even more angry. They had broken the promise of letting you in and had insulted you all in the front gates. You walked forward to stand next to Aegon as he watched them walk away with an angry scowl on his face.

“What are you doing?!” Daenerys asked beating you to the question. The man from before turned and faced you three. “You promised to receive us!”

“We have recieved you here we are and here you are.” The man answered.

“If you do not let us in all of us we will die!” Daenerys told him with anger in her tone.

“Which we shall deeply regret. But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.” The man said unbothered by what Daenerys had said and continued to walk away. You’ve had enough of this man so you spoke up this time. Ser Jorah seemed to notice what you were planning to do so he walked beside you.

“My Queen please be careful.” He warned you as he walked beside you.

“Y/N what are you doing?” Aegon asked in a whisper.

“Thirteen! Remember our Faces and our Names! We are the Targaryens and when our Dragons are grown we will take back what was stolen from us! We will destroy those who have wronged us! We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground! Turn us away and we will burn you first!” You warned them catching their attention once more and causing them to stop in their tracks.

“Ah you are a true Targaryen, only as the mother of dragons said a moment ago if we don’t let you into the city, you will all die. And so…”

“Retreating In fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.” One of the thirteen said stepping up front and next to the spice merchant.

“The discussion is over Xaro Xhoan Doxas. The thirteen have spoken.” The merchant told the man looking angered that he had stepped up.

“I am one of the thirteen and I am still speaking.” He told him.

“The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you shall invite them in for a cup of wine?” The merchant told him.

“She is the dragon queen do you expect her to watch her people to starve without breathing fire? I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city. After all, here I am, a savage from the summer isles and Qarth still stands.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said trying to convince the merchant. You looked over at Aegon and Ser Jorah not knowing to what to do at this matter as you heard them argue.

“Our decision is final.” The merchant continued saying. This man really is scared of us isn’t he?

“Very well.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said as he took a step forward and taking his sword out from its sheath. “I invoke soumai. I will vouch for them, her people and their dragons in accordance with the law.” He then proceeded to cut his hand. You were watching Intenly passing a glance over to Aegon and Daenerys.

“Be it on your head.” The merchant said as he saw the cut on Xaro Xhoan Daxos palm before storming off to stand to the side.

“Welcome to Qarth.”

.

.

.

.

.

.

“They’ll like it far less when we are done with them.” Daenerys said and you nodded your head in agreement. Irri rushed towards the horse and to the bag with Rakharo’s head. Her sobs were loud as she fell to the ground. Daenerys took her in her arms trying to comfort her. She was saying that they had killed his soul because they didn’t burn his body. Daenerys promised her that she will build a funeral pyre. You kneel down beside them feeling her pain. You don’t know what you would do if Aegon got killed. You place a hand on top of her head and brush her hair with your fingers for comfort. You then start talking to her in Dothraki.

“They’ll know about us just you watch they’ll soon regret the day they killed him and regret that they left our khalasar they’ll soon know who the Targaryens truly are.”

-

You wait again and again waiting for any of the other two bloodriders to come back. As you wait you sit and grab your dragon Oraxsus. You gently pet the top of her head. She’s still weak and seems weaker then before. She won’t even open her eyes today. You just see her little body move up and down very slow.

“Please wake up oraxsus come on you’re a strong girl I know so.” You whisper to her. You feel someone walk up behind you and sit by you. You turn your head and it’s Daenerys.

“Is she doing any better?” She asks you and you look back at oraxsus.

“No she seems to be doing worse now.” You can’t help but feel warm tears threaten to fall. You couldn’t help but think if you’re doing something wrong or if you’ve done something wrong. In such a little time you already feel attatched to this little dragon. You take a deep breath to try and calm yourself. You keep petting oraxsus until you don’t hear any noise coming from her. You watch closely and don’t see her chest moving anymore. You bring her little chest up to your ear and don’t hear her heartbeat and don’t feel her breath. The tears then return and this time they roll down your cheek. You look over at Daenerys who is still beside you. A sad look in your eyes something that she hasn’t seen in you. And something you’ve never showed her.

You don’t have to say anything for her to know what was going on. You continue to try and pet oraxsus as if that will do anything to her state. To see if with your touch she would wake up or return to life but she hasn’t. You bring one hand and cover your mouth as your tears roll down faster. Daenerys wraps her arm around your shoulder and pulls you closer to her. With her other hand she lets it brush your hair as she tries to sooth you. Your cries turn into sobs but they aren’t loud ones not wanting to let others see how you were. Not wanting to let them see you like this. You bring oraxsus lifeless body close to your chest. You then feel other arms wrap around you and you knew who’s they were.

At Aegons touch it only seemed to make you feel worse. Your sobs becoming a little louder then they were. He doesn’t say anything he just kisses the side of your head and comforts you. You didn’t feel Daenerys leave your side.

You later buried your dragon. Daenerys and Aegon were by your side when you did. Your dragon dying also made you think about something you had read about dragons long ago when you were younger. Something that scared you just a little as you remembered it. But also something you don’t want to believe in but theirs a little part of you that does. You had read that if dragons were born weak and died a little after birth then that meant that the person was of bad omen. But you also thought that was only in a book and that you shouldnt believe what it had said. You just let yourself wonder not telling anyone of your thoughts. That weren’t true. Or atleast you hoped.

Daenerys being worried for you and your dragon and comforting you made you feel differently about her. She had announced that she would rule by the side of you and your brother something you didn’t expect her to say but she did. She had always been kind to you but of course you were difficult. Maybe it’s alright to trust her and not kill her. Maybe

-

“This isnt your horse.” Daenerys said to the blood rider Kovarro that had returned. You stood up from where you were sitting and walked over to where they were.

“It was given to me by the thirteen the elders of Qarth.” Kovarro said.

“Qarth?” Aegon asked.

“Three days to the east, on the sea.” Kovarro answered.

“Will they let us in?” Daenerys asked him.

“They said they would be honored to recieve the mother of dragons and the Dragon queen and dragon king.” He answered as he got bags that were on his horse.

“What do you know of this place?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah.

“Only that the desert around there walls is called the garden of bones. Everytime the qartheen shut their gates on a traveler the garden grows.”

-

As we got closer to what Kovarro said was Qarth. Ser Jorah was right. The desert around the huge walls were huge. As we got close soilders came out from the gates and thirteen men followed behind them.

“I thought we were welcome?” Daenerys asked.

“If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city you would do the same khaleesi.” Ser Jorah said. You looked behind to the khalasar who was no horde at all.

“Horde?” You asked.

“My name is—”

“Your name is Daenerys of house Targaryen and you are Aegon Of house Targaryen and you Y/N of house Targaryen.” The man inturrpted casuing you to be confused on how he knew your names. Espically yours and Aegons.

“You know us my lord?” Daenerys asked the man who Inturrpted her.

“Only by reputation Khaleesi and I’m no lord merely a humble merchant. They call you the mother of dragons ” He said. You heard that name be called to her again ‘the mother of dragons’.It was a deserving name since she had three dragons and Aegon and you only had one. But it was still confusing on how fast they had thought of that name since you guys have been in a desert ever since they were born.

“And what should we call you?” She asked him.

“Oh my name is quite long and quite impossible for foreigners to pronounce I am simply a trader of spices.” He responded still not really answering her question. “But we are the thirteen charged with the governance and protection of Qarth the greatest city that ever was or will be.” He finished saying. You three looked at one another not knowing who was going to respond or how.

“The beauty of quarth is legendary—-“

“Qarth.” He corrected her.

“Eh Qarth.” She repeated saying it right this time.

“Might we see the dragons?” He asked. You three looked at eachother again and shared a knowing look and unspoken conversation. Aegon stepped up and spoke this time.

“My Friend we have traveled very far we have no food no water once we see our people fed we would be honored.” Aegon told the man.

“Forgive me Dragon King But no man alive has seen a living dragon. Some of my more skeptical friends refuse to believe your children even exist. All we ask is a chance to see for ourselves.” The man told Aegon. Aegon took a step closer trying to convince to man to let us all In.

“Trust me I saw them being born we are NOT liars.” Aegon responded his voice sounded annoyed at the man’s persistence on not letting us In.

“Well I don’t think you are because I’ve never met you before my opinion on the matter is of limited value.” The man answered.

“Where we come from guests are treated with respect not insulted at the gates.” Daenerys said also getting annoyed at the man. You were also getting annoyed all you wanted to do was atleast get some fresh water somewhere to be where it wasn’t covered with sand.

“Perhaps you should return where you came from we wish you well.” He responded getting you mad now. He then turned his back and began to walk away. This got you even more angry. They had broken the promise of letting you in and had insulted you all in the front gates. You walked forward to stand next to Aegon as he watched them walk away with an angry scowl on his face.

“What are you doing?!” Daenerys asked beating you to the question. The man from before turned and faced you three. “You promised to receive us!”

“We have recieved you here we are and here you are.” The man answered.

“If you do not let us in all of us we will die!” Daenerys told him with anger in her tone.

“Which we shall deeply regret. But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.” The man said unbothered by what Daenerys had said and continued to walk away. You’ve had enough of this man so you spoke up this time. Ser Jorah seemed to notice what you were planning to do so he walked beside you.

“My Queen please be careful.” He warned you as he walked beside you.

“Y/N what are you doing?” Aegon asked in a whisper.

“Thirteen! Remember our Faces and our Names! We are the Targaryens and when our Dragons are grown we will take back what was stolen from us! We will destroy those who have wronged us! We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground! Turn us away and we will burn you first!” You warned them catching their attention once more and causing them to stop in their tracks.

“Ah you are a true Targaryen, only as the mother of dragons said a moment ago if we don’t let you into the city, you will all die. And so…”

“Retreating In fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.” One of the thirteen said stepping up front and next to the spice merchant.

“The discussion is over Xaro Xhoan Doxas. The thirteen have spoken.” The merchant told the man looking angered that he had stepped up.

“I am one of the thirteen and I am still speaking.” He told him.

“The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you shall invite them in for a cup of wine?” The merchant told him.

“She is the dragon queen do you expect her to watch her people to starve without breathing fire? I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city. After all, here I am, a savage from the summer isles and Qarth still stands.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said trying to convince the merchant. You looked over at Aegon and Ser Jorah not knowing to what to do at this matter as you heard them argue.

“Our decision is final.” The merchant continued saying. This man really is scared of us isn’t he?

“Very well.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said as he took a step forward and taking his sword out from its sheath. “I invoke soumai. I will vouch for them, her people and their dragons in accordance with the law.” He then proceeded to cut his hand. You were watching Intenly passing a glance over to Aegon and Daenerys.

“Be it on your head.” The merchant said as he saw the cut on Xaro Xhoan Daxos palm before storming off to stand to the side.

“Welcome to Qarth.”

.

.

.

.

.

.

She’s still weak and seems weaker then before. She won’t even open her eyes today. You just see her little body move up and down very slow.

“Please wake up oraxsus come on you’re a strong girl I know so.” You whisper to her. You feel someone walk up behind you and sit by you. You turn your head and it’s Daenerys.

“Is she doing any better?” She asks you and you look back at oraxsus.

“No she seems to be doing worse now.” You can’t help but feel warm tears threaten to fall. You couldn’t help but think if you’re doing something wrong or if you’ve done something wrong. In such a little time you already feel attatched to this little dragon. You take a deep breath to try and calm yourself. You keep petting oraxsus until you don’t hear any noise coming from her. You watch closely and don’t see her chest moving anymore. You bring her little chest up to your ear and don’t hear her heartbeat and don’t feel her breath. The tears then return and this time they roll down your cheek. You look over at Daenerys who is still beside you. A sad look in your eyes something that she hasn’t seen in you. And something you’ve never showed her.

You don’t have to say anything for her to know what was going on. You continue to try and pet oraxsus as if that will do anything to her state. To see if with your touch she would wake up or return to life but she hasn’t. You bring one hand and cover your mouth as your tears roll down faster. Daenerys wraps her arm around your shoulder and pulls you closer to her. With her other hand she lets it brush your hair as she tries to sooth you. Your cries turn into sobs but they aren’t loud ones not wanting to let others see how you were. Not wanting to let them see you like this. You bring oraxsus lifeless body close to your chest. You then feel other arms wrap around you and you knew who’s they were.

At Aegons touch it only seemed to make you feel worse. Your sobs becoming a little louder then they were. He doesn’t say anything he just kisses the side of your head and comforts you. You didn’t feel Daenerys leave your side.

You later buried your dragon. Daenerys and Aegon were by your side when you did. Your dragon dying also made you think about something you had read about dragons long ago when you were younger. Something that scared you just a little as you remembered it. But also something you don’t want to believe in but theirs a little part of you that does. You had read that if dragons were born weak and died a little after birth then that meant that the person was of bad omen. But you also thought that was only in a book and that you shouldnt believe what it had said. You just let yourself wonder not telling anyone of your thoughts. That weren’t true. Or atleast you hoped.

Daenerys being worried for you and your dragon and comforting you made you feel differently about her. She had announced that she would rule by the side of you and your brother something you didn’t expect her to say but she did. She had always been kind to you but of course you were difficult. Maybe it’s alright to trust her and not kill her. Maybe

-

“This isnt your horse.” Daenerys said to the blood rider Kovarro that had returned. You stood up from where you were sitting and walked over to where they were.

“It was given to me by the thirteen the elders of Qarth.” Kovarro said.

“Qarth?” Aegon asked.

“Three days to the east, on the sea.” Kovarro answered.

“Will they let us in?” Daenerys asked him.

“They said they would be honored to recieve the mother of dragons and the Dragon queen and dragon king.” He answered as he got bags that were on his horse.

“What do you know of this place?” Aegon asked Ser Jorah.

“Only that the desert around there walls is called the garden of bones. Everytime the qartheen shut their gates on a traveler the garden grows.”

-

As we got closer to what Kovarro said was Qarth. Ser Jorah was right. The desert around the huge walls were huge. As we got close soilders came out from the gates and thirteen men followed behind them.

“I thought we were welcome?” Daenerys asked.

“If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city you would do the same khaleesi.” Ser Jorah said. You looked behind to the khalasar who was no horde at all.

“Horde?” You asked.

“My name is—”

“Your name is Daenerys of house Targaryen and you are Aegon Of house Targaryen and you Y/N of house Targaryen.” The man inturrpted casuing you to be confused on how he knew your names. Espically yours and Aegons.

“You know us my lord?” Daenerys asked the man who Inturrpted her.

“Only by reputation Khaleesi and I’m no lord merely a humble merchant. They call you the mother of dragons ” He said. You heard that name be called to her again ‘the mother of dragons’.It was a deserving name since she had three dragons and Aegon and you only had one. But it was still confusing on how fast they had thought of that name since you guys have been in a desert ever since they were born.

“And what should we call you?” She asked him.

“Oh my name is quite long and quite impossible for foreigners to pronounce I am simply a trader of spices.” He responded still not really answering her question. “But we are the thirteen charged with the governance and protection of Qarth the greatest city that ever was or will be.” He finished saying. You three looked at one another not knowing who was going to respond or how.

“The beauty of quarth is legendary—-“

“Qarth.” He corrected her.

“Eh Qarth.” She repeated saying it right this time.

“Might we see the dragons?” He asked. You three looked at eachother again and shared a knowing look and unspoken conversation. Aegon stepped up and spoke this time.

“My Friend we have traveled very far we have no food no water once we see our people fed we would be honored.” Aegon told the man.

“Forgive me Dragon King But no man alive has seen a living dragon. Some of my more skeptical friends refuse to believe your children even exist. All we ask is a chance to see for ourselves.” The man told Aegon. Aegon took a step closer trying to convince to man to let us all In.

“Trust me I saw them being born we are NOT liars.” Aegon responded his voice sounded annoyed at the man’s persistence on not letting us In.

“Well I don’t think you are because I’ve never met you before my opinion on the matter is of limited value.” The man answered.

“Where we come from guests are treated with respect not insulted at the gates.” Daenerys said also getting annoyed at the man. You were also getting annoyed all you wanted to do was atleast get some fresh water somewhere to be where it wasn’t covered with sand.

“Perhaps you should return where you came from we wish you well.” He responded getting you mad now. He then turned his back and began to walk away. This got you even more angry. They had broken the promise of letting you in and had insulted you all in the front gates. You walked forward to stand next to Aegon as he watched them walk away with an angry scowl on his face.

“What are you doing?!” Daenerys asked beating you to the question. The man from before turned and faced you three. “You promised to receive us!”

“We have recieved you here we are and here you are.” The man answered.

“If you do not let us in all of us we will die!” Daenerys told him with anger in her tone.

“Which we shall deeply regret. But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.” The man said unbothered by what Daenerys had said and continued to walk away. You’ve had enough of this man so you spoke up this time. Ser Jorah seemed to notice what you were planning to do so he walked beside you.

“My Queen please be careful.” He warned you as he walked beside you.

“Y/N what are you doing?” Aegon asked in a whisper.

“Thirteen! Remember our Faces and our Names! We are the Targaryens and when our Dragons are grown we will take back what was stolen from us! We will destroy those who have wronged us! We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground! Turn us away and we will burn you first!” You warned them catching their attention once more and causing them to stop in their tracks.

“Ah you are a true Targaryen, only as the mother of dragons said a moment ago if we don’t let you into the city, you will all die. And so…”

“Retreating In fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.” One of the thirteen said stepping up front and next to the spice merchant.

“The discussion is over Xaro Xhoan Doxas. The thirteen have spoken.” The merchant told the man looking angered that he had stepped up.

“I am one of the thirteen and I am still speaking.” He told him.

“The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you shall invite them in for a cup of wine?” The merchant told him.

“She is the dragon queen do you expect her to watch her people to starve without breathing fire? I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city. After all, here I am, a savage from the summer isles and Qarth still stands.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said trying to convince the merchant. You looked over at Aegon and Ser Jorah not knowing to what to do at this matter as you heard them argue.

“Our decision is final.” The merchant continued saying. This man really is scared of us isn’t he?

“Very well.” Xaro Xhoan Daxos said as he took a step forward and taking his sword out from its sheath. “I invoke soumai. I will vouch for them, her people and their dragons in accordance with the law.” He then proceeded to cut his hand. You were watching Intenly passing a glance over to Aegon and Daenerys.

“Be it on your head.” The merchant said as he saw the cut on Xaro Xhoan Daxos palm before storming off to stand to the side.

“Welcome to Qarth.”

.

.

.

.

.

.

summary: That's what gets me most. Daenerys didn't grow up around her father at all, who everyone wants to say she's just like unlike...
question: That's what gets me most. Daenerys didn't grow up around her father at all, who everyone wants to say she's just like unlike Cersei who did grow up with someone with Tywin and had his way of thinking. Dany grew up being abused by her only family and was still gentle and kind. And she kept getting abused.. emotionally and physically. But still she kept on. And she kept doing good by people. She didn't use the power she had gained to hurt others, that's her true nature. Daenerys, breaker of chains
answer: The entire point of her character and what drove her as a person was to save people from having to deal with the things she did growing up and worse. She’s the anti-mad king. But fuck us and fuck her right? Thanks D&D.

summary: Daenerys at the end being able to raise her child after losing two kids but losing the man she loves, the man who will love her...
question: Daenerys at the end being able to raise her child after losing two kids but losing the man she loves, the man who will love her for what she is and not for reasons like that she's going to have her child and was a property or that she's queen is bittersweet, because she will see the man she loves in her child everyday. Jon dying as a hero after being be resurrected and fulfill his mission, having a child that it's not a bastard and is going to grown up with love and a family is also bittersweet
answer:
Anon, you’re making me cry now! Congrats for putting this into word, and I think the same. Maybe the book will finish with Daenerys and her child hopping into a ship that will sail…somewhere, Maybe in Bravoos or even further, a lá

And she’ll live in a house with red door because she realizes she doesn’t want to be a Queen and how, in truth, no one wins the Game of Thrones. And she’ll regard her child as her new purpose for living and how, in that long, harsh winter that was both in Westeros and in her soul (after the War for the Dawn and Jon’s death), this beacon of hope made her dare to dream of spring. It would be in tone with the overarching theme of the series. This is what I would call bittersweet and an ending in the vein of L0TR (as Martin himself said about his ending).

summary: Hello :) How do you imagine Daenerys in books? In your perception is Emilia Clarke, as in the show or some kind of art, or do...
question: Hello :) How do you imagine Daenerys in books? In your perception is Emilia Clarke, as in the show or some kind of art, or do you build your own image when you read?Personally, I really like the work of Magali Villeneuve. Very realistic, as for me c:
answer:
Magali Villeneuve’s work is amazing, and I remember the first fanart of Daenerys I saw was one of her pieces! The version of Daenerys I imagine, though, is heavily inspired by this fancast of her, one of the earlier ones I found where she’s portrayed by Song Qian. I’ve also always thought of her as very expressive, both with her face and her body language, small but fairly muscled on account of her being pretty physically active, and as usually having short to medium length hair. (If I ever get around to drawing her one day hopefully I can convey exactly how I imagine her ^^;)

Thanks for the question anon!
